attributes.action: TO MAKE SIGNIFICANT CHANGERS TO CURRENT GUN CONTROL AND LICENSING PROCEDURES AND ADMINISTRATION TO PROTECT PUBLIC SAFETY AS FAR AS POSSIBLE
attributes.additional_details: TO MAKE SIGNIFICANT CHANGERS TO CURRENT GUN CONTROL AND LICENSING PROCEDURES AND ADMINISTRATION TO PROTECT PUBLIC SAFETY AS FAR AS IS POSSIBLE.. ASKS THAT THE CONSISTENCY OF LICENSING DECISION MAKING AND ENFORCEMENT BETWEEN FORCES IS REVIEWED.CALLS ON GOVERMENT TO BRING POLICE GUIDANCE ON FIREARMS LEGISLATIONUP-TO-DATE,CALLS FOR A CHANGE IN THE LAW TO CREATE A SINGLE SYSTEM FOR LICENSING OF SECTION 1 FIREARMS AND SHOTGUNS,AND TIGHTER RESTRICTIONS AND CLEARER GUIDANCE ON THE GRANTING OF FIREARMS , TO INDIVIDUALS WITH PAST INVOLEMENT IN ANY CRIMINAL ACTIVITY OR WITH PAST HISTORY OF MENTAL INSTABILITY OR DOMESTIC VIOLENCE IDENTIFIED BY APPROPIATE PERSONS,AND SEEKS BETTERCOOPERATION BETWEEN POLICE AND HEALTH PROFESSIONAL IN THE LICENSING SYSTEM
